description:
Welcome to Athenasia Academy Presentation Skills Workshop.

Athenasia Academy has more than 20,000 students worldwide on various platform including Udemy and we always get between 4 and 5 stars rating for our courses.

This course will help you to improve your presentation skills in a really short time. It's 100% video based and we are using a lot of videos from different talks to illustrate each of the principles we are explaining.

The course covers all the fundamentals of public speaking. We look at:

  • Structure: How to structure your talk with a proper Opening, Corpus (body) and Closing, how to handle Q&A, How to create your visuals, story telling,...
  • Verbal communication: Verbal aspect of public speaking you should consider when you are presenting such as: Voice, Tone, Words, Speed, Intonation...
  • Non Verbal communication: Non Verbal aspect of public speaking you should consider when you are presenting such as: Posture, Gesture, Facial Expression...
  • Congruence and feel: How to communicate the same message on different communication channels

Don't wait any longer and join us in this fast track course to develop your public speaking skills.
title: Presentation Skills Workshop
